description: Try our easy to follow Butterscotch Sauce Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Butterscotch Sauce Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place butter, brown sugar, cream and golden syrup in a saucepan. Stir over low heat until butter has melted and sauce is smooth. Increase heat and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 minutes. Set aside.
Remove banana bread from packaging and slice thickly. Place each portion onto a serving plate and top with the sliced banana.
Top with a scoop of ice cream, spoon over some of the sauce and decorate with almonds. Serve immediately.
